full_name: Scenario I: Return to The Untamed Wilds

steps.text: Create the exploration deck. Gather all of the single-sided [[Jungle]] locations. Include only 1 of the 2 locations with each of the following connection symbols, chosen at random.
steps.subtext: Remove the other 4 [[Jungle]] locations from the game. Do not include any of the other encounter cards listed in the original setup instructions (There should be a total of 5 cards.)

steps.text: For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rules apply:

bullets.text: The 'check your supplies' ability on the Expedition Camp can be used from any location.
Forced - After a successful exploration ends: Shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the exploration deck.
